newsitem.title: USA: Hughes higher tax rate hurts earnings.
newsitem.headline: Hughes higher tax rate hurts earnings.

text.p: Hughes Electronics Corp said the slight decline in its third quarter earnings was due mainly to a higher effective tax rate in the third quarter of 1996, which it said more than offset improved operating profit.

In a statement, Hughes chairman and chief executive officer also said that while each of the company's three business segments contributed to increased total revenues, its telecommunications and space segment accounted for the majority of the growth.
He added that increased commercial sattellite manufacturing sales and continued DIRECTV subscriber growth were the main factors behind the revenue growth in that segment.
